source.620fd4b3:
Above putput shows that there is no missing values in the dataset. As there is no missing
values in the given dataset, missing values treatment is not required here.
Lets move to our next check of imbalance testing. In imbalance check we will test whether
out dataset carrying any imbalance or not. Linear machine learning model are sensitive to
imbalance datasets and performs poorly on such datasets. So to test class imbalance we will
be using countplot from seaborn library.
source.1a5bb59e:

All the three population are not exactly same but it is okay according to defination of imbalance dataset in machine learning.
